title: Patents vs. trade secrets in the age of AI robotics
description:
Greenberg Traurig shares insights about how to choose the right IP strategy when algorithms, and not humans, drive innovation

The post Patents vs. trade secrets in the age of AI robotics appeared first on The Robot Report.
